name: Kyle's Last Day Off Earth
description:
You are Kyle, a maintenance droid who's been activated to help deal with a zombie outbreak aboard the space station.  You'll be guided by a stranger over PA through the station to find your escape.

Kyle's Last Day Off Earth features zombies, lasers, explosions, voice acting, winding space station tunnels, 'the puckboy level', pew pew pew sounds, collectable log entries and a procedurally generated final level to keep repeat play-throughs interesting!
